newsitem.title: USA: DLJ launches new Internet investment site.
newsitem.headline: DLJ launches new Internet investment site.

text.p: Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Inc said on Wednesday its online brokerage PC Financial Network launched a new Internet site.
PC Financial, the largest U.S. online brokerage service, opened a site at http://www.pcfn.com., the company said in a statement. The site would let members conduct online transactions, it said.

The site offered Standard & Poor's MarketScope, Zacks Investment Research Inc, Telesphere real-time stock quotes, Reuters Holdings Plc news, research from DLJ's Pershing Division and fund research from Lipper Analytical Services, the company said.
